site_name: Dryades48 The Bishops AvenueLondonN2 0BA
description: Variation of condition 1 (Approved plans) pursuant to planning permission 18/1363/S73 dated 03/05/2018 for 'Variation of condition 1 (Plans Numbers) pursuant to planning permission F/01397/12 dated 12/06/2012 for 'Extension to the time limit for implementing planning permission F/02063/09 granted 04/08/2009 for the erection of a two-storey dwelling house with rooms in basement and roof space, following demolition of the existing house. 'Amendments include redesign of the internal configuration from basement to roof level, relocation of plant at basement level, replacement of approved conservatory with a smaller sunroom and new lightwell to southern elevation and replacement conservatory with a slightly smaller footprint. Small bay window and recessed balcony to bedroom at first floor level. Alteration to landscaping, car ramp/lift. Retention of the existing carriageway access to the site.' Amendments to include alterations to the Arboricultural Report, Proposed Site Plan and Existing Trees Plan referenced in Condition 1 to include removal of tree T46, replacement tree for T46 and pruning to G26a. [AMENDED DESCRIPTION]
